Question:
Assume that the number of clusters $k=2$ for all of the following questions. 
Just as in (a), walk through each step of the $k$-means algorithm, beginning with the initialization shown in the plot in the top left. In each plot (go left to right, top to down), mark with two ' $x$ ' symbols where the cluster centers are in that iteration of $k$-means. Once the $k$-means algorithm has converged, you can leave all subsequent figures unmarked.
